tech_news.title: Phones were fashionable again in 2025 - The Verge
tech_news.description: From the wooden-back Motorola Razr Ultra to the iPhone 17 Pro’s vibrant turn in Cosmic Orange, phones made more fashion statements than usual in 2025.

tech_news.title: Semi-solid state MagSafe power banks arrive from the founder of Hyper - The Verge
tech_news.description: BMX SolidSafe semi-solid state MagSafe power banks from the founder of Hyper are now available. They’re safer and last longer than typical Li-ion power banks.

tech_news.title: How to Quickly Find Out What's Streaming on Multiple Services at Once - WIRED
tech_news.description: Build a watchlist of all the movies and shows you want to watch, no matter where they’re streaming.

tech_news.title: WatchGuard Warns of Active Exploitation of Critical Fireware OS VPN Vulnerability - The Hacker News
tech_news.description: WatchGuard fixed CVE-2025-14733, a critical Fireware OS VPN flaw with CVSS 9.3 that is actively exploited in the wild.

tech_news.title: This Chrome Extension Turns LinkedIn Posts About AI Into Facts About Allen Iverson - WIRED
tech_news.description: The developers of a browser tool that changes AI-centric LinkedIn posts to Allen Iverson facts want to help “take back control of your experience of the internet.”

tech_news.title: Welcome to Your New ROG Xbox Ally: Essential Tips for Getting Started - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Picking up a new ROG Xbox Ally or ROG Xbox Ally X? To help you hit the ground running, we’ve pulled together some must-know tips to make the most out of your new handheld.

tech_news.title: Deals for Today: Last Chance MTG Deals and a Bargain 2025 Apple iPad Air - IGN
tech_news.description: Deals for Today brings last-chance MTG savings, a discounted 2025 Apple iPad Air, and an RTX 5070 Ti gaming laptop now cheaper than Black Friday.

tech_news.title: Google Introduces New Android Features in Pixel Beta Update - CNET
tech_news.description: Participants in the Android Beta Program get first dibs on the next update, which is set to land in official form next year
